property.content: {{velocity}} #macro (__icon $name){{html clean="false"}} {{/html}}#end #if ($doc.getObject('PhenoTips.PatientClass')) #set ($colorTheme = $xwiki.getUserPreference('colorTheme')) #if ("$!colorTheme" != '') ## Make sure we use an absolute reference (see XWIKI-9672) #set ($colorTheme = $services.model.resolveDocument($colorTheme, $doc.documentReference)) #end $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.ContentTopMenu', {'colorTheme': $colorTheme})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.ContentTopMenu')## (% id="patient-record-actions" %)((( (% id="pr-more-actions-menu" class="menu menu-horizontal" %)((( #if ($xcontext.action == 'view') #if($hasEdit && !$isReadOnly) #set($editaction = $doc.getDefaultEditMode()) * [[#__icon("pencil")$services.localization.render('core.menu.edit')>>path:$doc.getURL($editaction, $!languageparams)|| id="prActionEdit"]] #end## HAS EDIT #set ($canDelete = !$doc.isNew() && $xwiki.checkAccess($doc.fullName, 'delete')) #if ($canDelete) * [[#__icon("times")$services.localization.render('core.menu.delete')>>path:$doc.getURL('delete', $!languageparams)|| id="prActionDelete"]] #end## HAS DELETE #else## NOT IN VIEW MODE, SHOW EDIT MODE ACTIONS * {{html clean="false"}} {{/html}} ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} * {{html clean="false"}} {{/html}} #end## DONE WITH EDIT MODE SPECIFIC ACTIONS * {{html clean="false"}} Jump to...{{/html}} ##The ToC will be populated by JS ** ---- * #__icon("cog") More actions #if ($xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != 'content') ** [[Open in view mode>>$doc.fullName|| title="Open record in view mode in a new window" target="__blank"]] #end #if ($isAdvancedUser && $xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != 'history') ** [[History>>path:$doc.getURL('view', 'viewer=history')|| target="__blank" title="See how the record was modified over time since its creation"]] #end #if ($xwiki.getDocument($xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')).getObject('XWiki.PDFClass')) #set ($pdfTemplate = $xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')) #else #set ($pdfTemplate = 'PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode') #end ** (% class="empty" %)---- ** [[Export PDF>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=pdf&pdfcover=0&pdftoc=0&pdftemplate=${pdfTemplate}")|| class="export-link"]] #if($isAdvancedUser) ** [[Export XAR>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=xar&name=${doc.fullName}&pages=${doc.fullName}")|| class="export-link"]] ** [[Export JSON>>path:$xwiki.getURL('PhenoTips.PatientPhenotypeExportService', 'get', "id=${doc.name}")|| class="export-link"]] #end #set ($hasExtensions = false) #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions("org.phenotips.patientRecordMenu.moreActions")) #set ($hasExtensions = true) #end #if ($hasExtensions) ** ---- #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions("org.phenotips.patientRecordMenu.moreActions")) ** {{html clean=false}}$services.rendering.render($e.execute(), 'xhtml/1.0'){{/html}} #end #end )))## menu )))## container #end{{/velocity}}
